abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ { "or" : [ "BasisOfRecord is Observation", "BasisOfRecord is Machine Observation", "BasisOfRecord is Human Observation", "BasisOfRecord is Material sample", "BasisOfRecord is Literature Occurrence", "BasisOfRecord is Specimen", "BasisOfRecord is Fossil" ] }, "HasCoordinate is true", "TaxonKey is Pantherophis Fitzinger, 1843", "HasGeospatialIssue is false" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Museo Argentino de Ciencias Naturales "Bernardino Rivadavia" (MACN). Herpetology National Collection (MACNHe) 1 records from Biodiversidad en el valle de Cuatro Ciénegas. 1 records from Inventario herpetofaunístico del noroeste de Hidalgo 1 records from Bioimages 1 records from Atlas des amphibiens et reptiles de Martinique 1 records from Inventario Español de Especies Terrestres (MAGRAMA) 1 records from MPM Herpetology 1 records from Ministerio de Medio Ambiente, y Medio Rural y Marino. Dirección General de Medio Natural y Política Forestal. Inventario Nacional de Biodiversidad 2007, Reptiles 1 records from Museu de Ciències Naturals de Barcelona: MCNB-Cord 1 records from CM Herps Collection 1 records from Macaulay Library Audio and Video Collection 2 records from University of Alberta Museum of Zoology Amphibian and Reptile Collection (UAMZ) 2 records from Animal Collections Of The Department of Zoology- Nasarawa State University Keffi 2 records from Base de datos de la Colección zoológica del Instituto de Investigación de zonas desérticas de la Universidad Autónoma de San Luis Potosí (BDCZIID-UASLP) 2 records from USGS SESC - Biscayne - Herpetofauna - 2002-2003 2 records from UCM Vertebrate Observations Collection (Arctos) 3 records from SMNS Herpetologie 3 records from Observations.be - Non-native species occurrences in Wallonia, Belgium 3 records from Herpetofauna del Estado de Veracruz 4 records from Diversidad de grupos selectos de vertebrados (Reptilia, Amphibia) e insectos (Lepidoptera: Papilionoidea y Hesperioidea; Odonata; Diptera: Bombyliidae) en el Valle de Cuatrociénegas y Sierra de la Madera, Coahuila, México 4 records from Oregon State University Herpetological Collection 5 records from Demografía e historia de vida de la lagartija Xenosaurus newmanorum en Xilitla, San Luis Potosí 6 records from naturgucker 7 records from PSM Vertebrates Collection 8 records from Herpetofauna de la región El Huizache, San Luis Potosí 9 records from The Herpetology Collection at the Staatliches Museum für Naturkunde Stuttgart 9 records from Southeastern Louisiana University Herpetology Collection 10 records from LSUMZ Herps Collection 10 records from USGS SESC - Big Cypress - Herpetofauna - 2002-2003 10 records from USGS SESC - Everglades - Herpetofauna - 2000-2002 10 records from Cowan Tetrapod Collection - Herpetology 10 records from NBMB Herps 11 records from Waarnemingen.be - Non-native animal occurrences in Flanders and the Brussels Capital Region, Belgium 12 records from Anfibios y reptiles del estado de Querétaro 12 records from Observation.org, Nature data from the Netherlands 12 records from MCNH Museum of Cultural and Natural History Reptile Collection 17 records from SDNHM Herpetology Collection 17 records from UTEP Herpetology Osteology (Arctos) 18 records from BYU Herpetology Collection 19 records from UTEP Fossils (Arctos) 20 records from MSB Amphibian and Reptile Collection (Arctos) 20 records from Actualización de la taxonomía y distribución de los anfibios y reptiles de San Luis Potosí 21 records from Anfibios y reptiles de las regiones 30 (Parque Natural Sierra Maderas del Carmen); 31 (Sierra El Burro-Río San Rodrigo); 36 (Sierra La Encantada); y 37 (Sierra El Pino), Coahuila 22 records from Bell Museum amphibians and reptiles 23 records from Geographically tagged INSDC sequences 34 records from Georgia Southern University - Savannah Science Museum Herpetology Collection 36 records from TNHC Herpetology Collection 39 records from Anfibios y reptiles del estado de Nuevo León 41 records from UCM Amphibian and Reptile Collection (Arctos) 42 records from Paleobiology Database 68 records from Anfibios y reptiles del estado de Tamaulipas, México 69 records from Tissues Specimens 71 records from Vertebrate Zoology Division - Herpetology, Yale Peabody Museum 79 records from Formación de una base de datos y elaboración de un atlas de la herpetofauna de México 80 records from MVZ Herp Collection (Arctos) 89 records from Ohio State University Tetrapod Division - Reptile Collection (OSUM) 107 records from University of Florida Vertebrate Paleontology 112 records from CAS Herpetology (HERP) 121 records from LACM Vertebrate Collection 123 records from CUMV Amphibian and Reptile Collection 209 records from Canadian Museum of Nature Amphibian and Reptile Collection 241 records from Museum of Comparative Zoology, Harvard University 248 records from UTEP Herpetology (Arctos) 262 records from AUMNH Herpetology Voucher Collection 337 records from Reptile Specimens 350 records from KUBI Herpetology Collection 358 records from FHSM Herps Collection 667 records from Biodiversity Research and Teaching Collections - TCWC Vertebrates 759 records from NMNH Extant Specimen Records 1449 records from NCSM Herpetology Collection 1735 records from University of Florida Herpetology 9087 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations
